titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to provide a temporary increase in the minimum end strength level for active duty personnel for the Army, the Marine Corps, and the Air Force, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 2/9/2005--Introduced. Increases, during FY 2005 through 2009, the minimum end strength levels for active-duty personnel of the : (1) Army from 502,400 to 522,400; (2) Marine Corps from 178,000 to 190,000; and (3) Air Force from 359,700 to 388,000.
